name: Zombie Survival Shooter but with no shooting of zombies in order to survive.
name_original: Zombie Survival Shooter but with no shooting of zombies in order to survive.
description:
Fight through a horde of zombies without shooting.

Top down survival game with no guns.

This is one of two games I made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2018 game jam, the other was https://staggames.itch.io/the-floor-is-lava
